name: Ringful
tag_list: web-services, telco, voice, sms, iphone--facebook, mobile, restful
overview:
Ringful Health provides a suite of patient-centered engagement and decision support systems throughout the entire care cycle, from disease prevention, screening, hospital admission, in-hospital stay, discharge, to post-discharge follow up.

Ringful Health solutions engage clinicians, patients and care givers via popular mobile devices including cell phones, smart phones, and tablets. They disseminate evidence-based content and guidelines directly to patients, help everyone involved make better decisions at the point of care, and improve communication between clinicians, care givers and patients.

Ringful Health solutions are designed to work with existing healthcare workflows and hospital teamwork structures without adding undue burdens to clinicians.
